thread.title: Hudson Hotel very small room
thread.title_full: Hudson Hotel very small room - Review of Hudson Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: U9286KDmariac
title: Hudson Hotel very small room
text:
Great price on a Sunday night. Clean. Extremely small with no seating other than bed and one hard chair. Not enough towels for 2 people one night but did not have a chance to request more.
Huge lobby and common areas but very few comfortable seating.
Room needs more light
Too much light in room from outside
Terrace was closed
